hero.title: Prescriptions
hero.subtitle: Managing your medications has never been easier. Refill online, transfer from another pharmacy, or sync all your prescriptions for convenient pickup.

refillSteps.title: Submit Your Refill
refillSteps.description: Call us, use our online form, or stop by in person with your prescription number.

refillSteps.title: We Process It
refillSteps.description: Our pharmacists verify your prescription, check for interactions, and prepare your medication.

refillSteps.title: Get Notified
refillSteps.description: Receive a text or call when your prescription is ready for pickup or delivery.

refillSteps.title: Pick Up or Deliver
refillSteps.description: Grab your medications at your convenience, or let us deliver them free to your door.

faq.question: How long does a refill take?
faq.answer: Most refills are ready within 15-30 minutes. For new prescriptions or controlled substances, please allow up to 2 hours.

faq.question: Can I refill my prescription early?
faq.answer: This depends on your insurance and the type of medication. Generally, you can refill 7 days before running out. Controlled substances may have stricter requirements.

faq.question: How do I transfer my prescriptions?
faq.answer: Simply bring your current prescription bottles or provide your previous pharmacy's information. We'll contact them directly and handle the entire transfer process.

faq.question: Do you accept my insurance?
faq.answer: We accept most major insurance plans, Medicare Part D, and Medicaid. Contact us with your insurance information, and we'll verify your coverage.

faq.question: What if I don't have insurance?
faq.answer: We offer competitive cash prices and can help you find manufacturer coupons and patient assistance programs to reduce your costs.

insuranceInfo.title: Insurance & Pricing
insuranceInfo.description: We accept most major insurance plans and work hard to ensure you get the best price for your medications.

ctaSection.title: Ready to Get Started?
ctaSection.description: Transfer your prescriptions today and experience the River Park Pharmacy difference.
